draw_control_box: Click and drag to draw the box, release to finish drawing
draw_control_drag: Click over shape then drag it to move it
draw_control_line: Click to create the points of the line, double tap to finish drawing
draw_control_point: Click on the map to reposition
draw_control_polygon: Click to create a vertex, double click to finish
gpsEnable: Your GPS needs to be enabled.
